title: I dont see any option to run the game in full screen ?
body: What to do ? I have only window...

replies.body:
If the only option is for window then there could be a config issue not allowing the setting.  A config reset might be able to help:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.
